pages.text: The Watcher is a greatsword that boasts an eerie blinking eye on its hilt, which is said to be the source of its power. Its blade is made of a dark, almost black metal that seems to absorb the light around it.

The Watcher is known to be capable of instantly felling any enemy in a single strike, but it's said to only happen when the wielder is in a state of pure focus, and when the enemy is at a critical state. It is said that only a true warrior, one with a strong will and a lust for power, can wield The Watcher and harness its full potential.
